form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Murphy introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar limitation on the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Child Care Flex Spending Act of 2013.

section.header: Increase in dollar limitation on exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance

subsection.text: Subparagraph (A) of section 129(a)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking shall not exceed and all that follows and inserting the following:

clause.text: in the case of a taxpayer whose modified adjusted gross income for such taxable year is less than $100,000 (twice such amount in the case of a joint return), $10,000 (half such amount in the case of a separate return by a married individual), and
in any other case, $5,000 (half such amount in the case of a separate return by a married individual).

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 129(a) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: For purposes of this paragraph, the term modified adjusted gross income means the adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for the taxable year increased by any amount excluded from gross income under section 911, 931, or 933.

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 129(a) of such Code, as amended by subsection (b), is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: In the case of any taxable year beginning in a calendar year after 2014, each dollar amount contained in subparagraph (A) shall be increased by an amount equal to—

clause.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year in which the taxable year begins, determined by substituting calendar year 2013 for calendar year 1992 in subparagraph (B) thereof.

subparagraph.continuation-text: Any increase determined under the preceding sentence shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of $50.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2013.
